block.p: LEE-Julia, on October 8, 2000. Beloved wife of the late Henry T.S. Lee. Caring mother of Josette Lee Greechan and Stanley Lee. Adoring grandmother of Jennifer and Jonathan. Loving mother-in-law of Pentti Niiranen and Jeanie Lee. Devoted sister of Gerald and Nancy Tsai. Family will receive friends Wednesday, 6-9 PM at Bennett Funeral Home, Scarsdale, NY. Services will be held Thursday, 1 PM at Hitchcock Presbyterian Church, Scarsdale, NY. Interment to follow at the Ferncliff Cemetery. Donations may be made to the Hitchcock Presbyterian Church, 6 Greenacres Ave, Scarsdale, NY, 10583.
